qas.question: Magnates recieved gifts often from who?
What significantly increased the magnates wealth?
What terms were these gifts given?
What did the magnates do eventually with the gifts?

context: <a1_0>Magnates<a1_0/> often received gifts from <a0_0>monarchs<a0_0/>, which significantly increased their wealth. Often, those gifts were only <a2_0>temporary leases<a2_0/>, which the magnates <a3_0>never returned<a3_0/> (in the 16th century, the anti-magnate opposition among szlachta was known as the ruch egzekucji praw—movement for execution of the laws—which demanded that all such possessions are returned to their proper owner, the king).
